entry.title: WIND WARNING , Claresholm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:24 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 7.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 12:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 7.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: W 19 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 90 in wind prone areas late this evening and overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 40%
